mods.note: INDEXED v>— I forward herewith a list of cases on which 31 ST. decisions are required before the aid March. I should be most grateful if you could kindly do time F.A.K, Harrison, Esquire, Commonwealth Relations Office, Downing Street, W. Sib ' ***■■ *^% f 'LB'

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 561/48 'List of Persian Gulf cases which require decisions before 31 March 1948'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter from the Political Resident, Persian Gulf, to the Commonwealth Relations Office listing outstanding cases that require decisions by the end of March 1948, and requesting relevant instructions. The cases relate to financial, staffing and estates issues in British Agencies in the Gulf.
